name: Ahazou
headline: Podium for local businesses in Latam
description: Ahazou is a SaaS app that helps offline local businesses to connect online with their customers to promote their brand, to build their reputation and to sell more. We've reached USD100k MRR with 16k+ subscribers. Our vision is to build the next all-in-one platform for 50 million local businesses to grow online in Latam. The company is founded by Rui Miadaira - 10+ years building local businesses, 3x entrepreneur, tech background with a Harvard MBA - and has built a team from iFood, Movile, PicPay. Ahazou is backed by GFC, Monashees, Y Combinator (S21) and more.

Ahazou is a Brazilian startup that serves as a digital marketing platform for local businesses in Latin America. Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Ahazou has quickly gained traction, boasting over 16,000 subscribers and reaching $100,000 in monthly recurring revenue (MRR). 

At its core, Ahazou is a SaaS application designed to bridge the gap between offline local businesses and their customers online. The mission is clear: create a comprehensive platform that empowers 50 million local businesses in Latin America to grow and thrive in an increasingly digital world. 

The company is led by Rui Miadaira, a seasoned entrepreneur with a tech background and a Harvard MBA, alongside a team that brings experience from major players like iFood, Movile, and PicPay. This diverse expertise helps drive innovation and user-friendliness in their offerings. 

Ahazou specializes in providing ready-made content for social media, complete with posts, stories, videos, and captions tailored for various industries—from beauty and wellness to automotive and real estate. Their app features over 350,000 unique content pieces, designed by professionals, which users can personalize with their branding in just three minutes. This accessibility democratizes high-quality content creation, saving users time and money compared to traditional agencies or freelancers.

The platform's subscription model is competitively priced, promising unlimited access to content without the constraints of watermarks or hidden fees. Their Prime and Pro plans cater to different business needs, enhancing user engagement and visibility across social media platforms.

Supported by well-respected investors—including GFC, Monashees, and Y Combinator—Ahazou is strategically positioned to scale its impact. With a strong team and an expanding user base, the company aims not just to be a tool, but a fundamental partner for local businesses seeking online presence and growth.

For more about their services, you can visit their website [Ahazou.com](https://ahazou.com).
